meta.title: Families First Coronavirus Response Act - King William County Public Schools

link.title: King William County Public Schools - News
Cool Spring Primary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: The Summer Food Service Program begins April 13, 2020 and will go through May 29, 2020. Details of the pick-up times and places are detailed in the media release found under the "Meal Distribution" tab of the COVID-19 Information page, Facebook, and under District News. There are multiple site across the county where food can be picked-up, and the student does NOT need to be present.

li.a: Guidelines for Decorum in Meetings & Other Interactions

span.p:
The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA or Act) requires certain employers to provide their
employees with paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave for specified reasons related to COVID-19.These provisions will apply from April 1, 2020 through December 31, 2020.
